Chapter 2 Performance descriptors 2.1 Growth vroom::vroom("data/paracou.tsv") %>% filter(BotaSource == "Bota") %>% group_by(Genus, Species, idTree) %>% arrange(CensusYear) %>% mutate(FirstDead = first(CensusYear[CodeAlive == 0])) %>% mutate(FirstDead = ifelse(is.na(FirstDead), max(CensusYear)+1, FirstDead)) %>% filter(CensusYear < FirstDead) %>% summarise(AGR = (last(DBH) - first(DBH))/(last(CensusYear) - first(CensusYear))) %>% na.omit() %>% group_by(Genus, Species) %>% summarise(AGR = median(AGR)) %>% vroom::vroom_write("data/species_growth.tsv") vroom::vroom("data/species_growth.tsv") %>% kable(caption = "Median of annual growth rate of all individuals across species (cm/year).")
